statements: UPDATE ewaste_recycling_companies SET certifications = 'ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE ewaste_recycling_companies SET services = 'E-waste Collection, Recycling, Data Destruction' WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE ewaste_recycling_companies SET services = 'E-waste collection, recycling, and disposal' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE ewaste_recycling_companies SET contact_person = 'Jenny Doe', certifications = 'ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001' WHERE company_name = 'GreenTech Recyclers';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Earth Recycling', services = 'Paper Recycling' WHERE company_id = '9073e174-49a5-4ed1-b3b4-8b93e764d7ec';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET certifications = 'ISO 14001:2015', contact_name = 'Jane Doe', contact_email = 'jane.doe@example.com' WHERE company_id = '0c8b5e28-0c94-4df4-917d-9496bcd747f2';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET contact_name='John Doe', contact_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE company_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET services='Plastic Recycling, Paper Recycling', certifications='ISO 14001' WHERE company_id='3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Recycling Company' WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE recycling_services SET description = 'Recycling plastic waste materials' WHERE service_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';

UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Earth Recycling', services = 'Recycling, Composting', certifications = 'ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001', contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@greenearth.com' WHERE company_id = 'a2c6e67b-7145-4bd7-a5ba-2f4e3212e39d';
UPDATE recycling_services SET description = 'Collects and processes electronic waste', service_name = 'E-Waste Recycling' WHERE company_id = 'a2c6e67b-7145-4bd7-a5ba-2f4e3212e39d';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Eco Solutions' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE services SET service_description = 'Waste collection and recycling services' WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Earth Recycling', certification_status = TRUE WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE certifications SET issued_date = '2022-01-15', expiration_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE certification_id = 3;
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Eco Solutions' WHERE company_id = '1c21e542-0240-4b13-a273-b597f1b8b6c6';
UPDATE certifications SET valid_until = '2023-12-31' WHERE certification_id = '9e3bd3a8-158a-4c43-ba7a-9d41c0f6d1b4';
UPDATE recycling_companies SET company_name = 'Green Recyclers', certifications = array_append(certifications, 'Green Certification') WHERE company_id = '2f9b706e-5202-4d4c-b2d2-1b7e6d22494b'
UPDATE certifications SET valid_until = '2023-12-31', issuing_organization = 'EcoCert' WHERE certification_id = '339b706e-5202-4d4c-b2d2-1b7e6d22494b'
